class bhp_sync.classes.BaseSyncModel(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_base_model.classes.base_uuid_model.BaseUuidModel

Base model class for all models using an UUID and not an INT for the primary key.

save(*args, **kwargs)¶

Note: An incoming transaction produced by self may exist, but is not wanted, if received by fanout from a consumer of transactions of self (this producer). that is (hostname_modified==hostname).
